name: Cookie Crush Classic
description:
Swap, match and crush tasty cookies as you solve hundreds of fun puzzles in this new and completely free match 3 puzzle game! A cute, colorful world of cookies, cake and waffles is waiting for you. Play with all kinds of sweet delights and candy like chocolate, cream and gingerbread to satisfy your sweet tooth, relax, and have endless fun!

Cookie Crush Classic Features:

Cookie Crush Classic isn't just gluten free, it's money free as well! Play as much as you want for as long as you want without lives or timers to hold you back. It's simple: don't worry about hearts and just enjoy the cute, sweet confectionery! This cookie jar is always open!

Simple & Fun:
Using classic match 3 games rules makes this puzzle game simple to just pick up and play whenever you want. You'll hear the satisfying crunch of the cookie under your finger when you crush them, and can enjoy trying lots of different strategies in the fun and cute levels full of candy and cake.

Tons of creative levels:
Dynamic obstacles, hidden waffles, creative challenges; Cookie Crush Classic has got it all. This tasty puzzle game has been designed to give you hours and hours of seamless puzzle fun! It's a blast!

No data needed:
Cookie Crush Classic plays straight from your phone. No connection to Facebook, no mandatory updates, no wifi data costs: just install and play!

How to play:

■ Swap cookies to match 3 or more in a row
■ Crush cake and cookies to complete levels
■ Blast away waffles to free up more space
■ Every cookie you crush gives you points
■ Get 3 stars or more to get bonus coins
■ When you get stuck, swap in one of the many powerful boosters to help you on your way - it's that simple!

Plan your moves, think about how to match 3 cookies in a row, use boosters carefully and blast your way through hundreds of fun and original levels! With daily free item spins, new levels added regularly, and various special cookies and effects, Cookie Crush Classic will keep you coming back to the cookie jar for just one last cookie over and over again!
